S.FORM: Ride i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Ride. u kasalumaluma' nu Ride sa, 167 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 420 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 153 ku tademaw, pakalatu 36 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 267 ku tademaw, pakalatu 64 . u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 35 , Amis 1 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
